strapiPost.title: Walton Executive MBA Program Invites Professionals Into A Global Immersion Experience
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by the Walton MBA Program at the University of Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
The Walton Executive MBA program offers a broad knowledge of how business fits together and is ready to transform your life and accelerate your career if you are. 

  • Critically acclaimed: The Wall Street Journal recently ranked the Walton MBA program #11 out of 600 programs for its return on investment, and U.S. News & World Reports ranked the program as the 36th best public MBA in the nation. 
  • Designed for you: The program is 2-years, primarily online, with one in-person Saturday each month designed to network with your cohort and faculty. You will have the opportunity to travel the world in a global immersion experience through the program, too. The program starts in the fall, and GMAT/GRE waivers are available now. 

Learn more and apply HERE before July 1.
